definitions.body: :Is 28:15 scourge, whip (NH id., so Ar. sawt.un, sa0t.a mix, stir about and beat; Eth. w Aram. [[שׁוֹטֶא]], sawt’:; from foregoing? cf. Germ. streifen; or onomat., cf. swish, switch?);—´[[שׁ]]: abs. Is 10:26 +, cstr. Job 5:21; pl. [[שׁוֹטִים]] 1Ki 12:11 +;—

scourge, for chastisement, 1Ki 12:11, 1Ki 12:14 = 2Ch 10:11, 2Ch 10:12 (all c. vb. [[יִסַּר]]); fig. of national scourge (wielded by ´[[י]]:) Is 10:26, Is 28:15 (Qr; > Kt [[שׁיט]]), v:Is 28:18 (both [[שׁוֹטֵף]] ´[[שׁ]]:, v. [[שׁטף]]), calamity Job 9:23; lash of (accusing) tongue Job 5:21 (rd. ´[[מִשּׁ]]: as LXX).
whip, for horse, ´[[קוֹל שׁ]]: Na 3:2 i.e. crack of whip, [[לַסּוּם]] ´[[שׁ]]: Pr 26:3 (‖[[שֵׁבֶט לְגֵו כְּ סִילִים ]]).
